entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Elliot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:08 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 5:08 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets beginning early in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:08 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Snow mixed with ice pellets early in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 5:08 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 5. Forecast issued 5:08 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 5:08 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 1. Forecast issued 5:08 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 5:08 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1. Forecast issued 5:08 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 5:08 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High zero. Forecast issued 5:08 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 5:08 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 2. Forecast issued 5:08 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
